content: असंग {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not attached, free from worldly ties. {@--2@} Not hindered or obstructed, not blunted; असंगमद्रिष्वपि सारवत्तया <ls>R. 3. 63</ls>; तस्य मूर्घ्नि शितं खड्गमसक्तं पर्वतेष्वपि <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--3@} Not united, solitary, unassailed. --गः {@--1@} Non-attachment; <ls>Ms. 6. 75.</ls> {@--2@} {%Puruṣa%} or soul (in Sān. <ab>phil.</ab>) °वत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} not attached to.
